ComicInfo.Summary: Iron Man and Black Widow go underwater to investigate a reported UFO that crashed, where they are captured by the Iron Spider. They escape when the Spider's headquarters is demolished by the Sub-Mariner.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:36:05. [Issue ID 782020]
